page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: THE PEOPLE LIVING IN THIS BLOCK HAVE A VARIETY OF OCCUPATIONS. ALL THE RESIDENTS OF SLAPEWATH ARE SELF-EMPLOYED AND ALTHOUGH THERE IS SOME INDUSTRY AND FARMING, MANY OF THE PEOPLE TRAVEL TO WORK IN OTHER AREAS, MANY IN THE STEEL AND CHEMICAL PLANTS IN NEAR-BY TEESSIDE, AS WELL AS OTHER KINDS OF WORK IN GUISBOROUGH AND MIDDLESBROUGH. ALTHOUGH A FEW OF THE RESIDENTS OF THE AREA WORK LOCALLY, MOST OF THE LOCAL FIRMS EMPLOY WHAT LABOUR THEY NEED FROM GUISBOROUGH AND OTHER NEARBY PLACES. THERE ARE ALSO A NUMBER OF ELDERLY RETIRED PEOPLE AND PEOPLE WHO HAVE TAKEN EARLY RETIREMENT OR BEEN MADE REDUNDANT.
